overview: "Cover Boys” Lukas Ridgeston and Johan Paulik return to video in all new, never-before-shown hard-action sequences. Johan pairs with Sebastian Bonnet and Tim Hamilton and Lukas teams with Claude Cocteau, Jason Paradis and Max Orloff. Featuring all the completed footage from the unfinished Greek holiday project, “Lukas in Love.” A bonus episode reunites Lukas and Johan toying with Adam Cartier.
title: Coverboys
